name: swaaappy
description:
For "My First Game Jam: Summer 2020"

The aim is get the a high score. Points an be gained from getting upgrades and defeating enemies. The more upgrades you get, the tougher the enemies get but will reward more points on defeat. Blue enemy projectiles cannot hurt you if you are blue and likewise with yellow projectiles when you are yellow. It is the opposite for the enemies though. Yellow player projectiles hurts yellow enemies and likewise with blue player projectiles on blue enemies. Have fun :)

There's a bad bug right now. If the "shrapnel" upgrade is picked up, the next life will have strange behavior. Restarting is a solution.

Gamepad Controls Only (for now, I can add keyboard/mouse if someone wants)

Right Stick: Move

Left Stick: Shoot

Right Shoulder: Swap

Left Shoulder: Speed Boost
